}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Additional specifications, per the manufacturer's site, follow.. *Receive sensitivity: ranges from -100 to -62 dBm, +- 2 dBm **Receiver LNA gain: +15 dBm *Tx power: up to 20 dBm per stream w/ QAM16
